text: Road Atlanta The 2000 Petit Le Mans presented by Audi was the third running of the Petit Le Mans and the ninth round of the 2000 American Le Mans Series season. It took place at Road Atlanta, Georgia, on September 30, 2000. ==Official results== Class winners in bold. {| class="wikitable" style="font- size: 95%;" ! rowspan=2 | Pos ! rowspan=2 | Class ! rowspan=2 | No ! rowspan=2 | Team ! rowspan=2 | Drivers !
